name: Cheesy Maze - Mouse Escape
description:
Do you like amazing labyrinth quests and maze running missions? Yep, and that’s great! Control a little mouse trying to find the way out of the large colorful labyrinth! Gather yummy cheesy pieces paving your way through the most interesting places! Download our new Cheesy Maze - Mouse Escape game and solve this fascinating puzzle!

Cheesy Maze - Mouse Escape features:
• Stunning labyrinth running quest
• Control your mouse to find all the cheese and escape
• Choose different maze locations
• Unlock various skins for your mouse
• Hurry up to leave this place quickly
• Use hints to make the mouse find the way on her own

Check your attentiveness and logic skills playing our awesome Cheesy Maze - Mouse Escape game controlling the little mouse and trying to find the way out!
